title: Boost Mobileâ€™s BoostOne app touts blockchain-backed currency
content:
U.S. prepaid wireless carrier Boost Mobile has recently announced a promotion, offering ways for its customers to earn rewards through its BoostOne app. The in-app currency can be applied toward merchandise discounts and even free wireless service. Parent company Dish Network is once again experimenting with ways to disrupt the wireless industry. Boost Mobile customers

The post Boost Mobile’s BoostOne app touts blockchain-backed currency appeared first on XDA.
description: Boost Mobile has announced its BoostOne app, giving users the ability to earn Boostcoins, its blockchain-backed currency.
